programme.title: Ini Harta Bedu Punya
programme.desc: Bedu,12, mempunyai IQ yang tinggi walaupun dia nampak lurus. Arwah ayah Bedu meletakkan harta semua kepada Bedu manakala separuh harta lagi diserahkan kepada ibunya Thalia. Apabila mengetahui tentang pembahagian harta tersebut, bapa saudaranya, Sadiq mula mengatur perancangan dengan isterinya, Minah untuk dapatkan sebahagian harta itu dengan ingin menjual tanah kebun arwah ayah Bedu.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep5
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Studio Awie
programme.desc: Kisah Awie seorang eksekutif pentadbiran yang kedekut, hati kering dan pentingkan diri sendiri. Dia juga ialah seorang duda dan mempunyai anak lelaki bernama Syahmil.

programme.title: Mau Jadi Apa?
programme.desc: Nordin menghantar pembulinya, Roy, ke hospital. Rudy pula ditangkap polis. 6 bulan kemudian, Nordin menjuarai rancangan kuiz yang selalu ditonton oleh banduan-baduan sesama Rudy. Rudy mengecam Nordin dan mula merancang cara melarikan diri dari penjara supaya dapat membalas dendam ke atas Nordin.

programme.title: Cantik Cantik Serigala
programme.desc: Raffi memasukkan kunci ke dalam lukisan gembok, lalu pintu terbuka dengan tiba-tiba membebaskan serigala yang membuatnya terjatuh. Dalam usaha melarikan diri, Raffi tersandung dan terjatuh ke dalam jurang. Tiba-tiba objek itu menghilang, seolah-olah masuk ke dalam tubuh Raffi. Apabila dia sedar, Raffi bertanya di mana dia dan siapakah gadis di hadapannya. Lalu, gadis itu memperkenalkan diri sebagai Sisil.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep106
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep60
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: D'Academy 6 Ep14
programme.desc: D'Academy Musim 6 (DA6) merupakan acara pencarian bakat menyanyi dangdut untuk musim keenam D'Academy.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta Ep24
programme.desc: Starla dan Niko merupakan pasangan yang sempurna. Mereka mempunyai dua orang anak, iaitu Nila dan Daffa. Walaupun begitu, Niko secara rahsia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Ayu, rakan lama Starla dan Niko dari sekolah menengah. Mereka berdua cuba menyembunyikan hubungan tersebut dari siapa pun. Suatu hari, Ilham, suami Ayu, melihat mereka bermesraan di dalam kereta. Niko dan Ayu melarikan diri, Ilham mengejar mereka. Malangnya, mereka bertiga akhirnya terlibat dalam kemalangan.

programme.title: Cinta di Kamar 32 Emang Lagi Lucu Lucunya
programme.desc: Ibu Kevin tidak mahu semua orang tahu bahawa dia adalah pewaris tunggal kepada kotej mereka. Kevin juga tidak menyedari rancangan ibunya apabila dia datang.

Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: I (2021)
programme.desc: Ah-Young who grew up in an orphanage becomes the babysitter of Young-Chae, who is raising a 6-month-old child on her own. One day, her child has an accident and she places all the blame on Ah-Young...

programme.title: Mother
programme.desc: When her mentally challenged son becomes the prime suspect in a murder, his mother does whatever it takes to clear his name.

programme.title: Canola
programme.desc: Gye-choon and her lost granddaughter Hye-ji reunited after 12 years, yet Hye-ji's strange behavior raise questions on what happened to her while they were apart.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: The Childe
programme.desc: A Kopino boxer goes to Korea to search for his estranged father for his mother's surgery, but his surroundings have turned into a mess after he met a mysterious man known as "Nobleman"...

programme.title: My Lovely Angel
programme.desc: A man bears the responsibility to take care of a deaf-blind girl unexpectedly, which turns out to be life-changing to both of them.

programme.title: Villain & Widow
programme.desc: Widow Yeon-ju rents out the second floor of her home to a novelist. The neighbors suspect the novelists true identity as he spends an inordinate time whenever he's left home alone

programme.title: Josee
programme.desc: Yong Seok helps Jose to get home after finding she has fallen from her electric wheelchair. From then on, the two meet up more often and starts developing feeling for one another.

programme.title: A Werewolf Boy
programme.desc: A girl is sent to a country house for her health, where she befriends and attempts to civilize a feral boy she discovers on the grounds - but the beast inside him is constantly waiting to burst out.

programme.title: Papa
programme.desc: A Korean talent agent arrives in America and goes through with a fake marriage to stay there. However, his fake wife later dies in a car accident, leaving him with her six children.

programme.title: Mother
programme.desc: When her mentally challenged son becomes the prime suspect in a murder, his mother does whatever it takes to clear his name.

programme.title: Miracle: Letters To The President

programme.title: Ditto
programme.desc: A voice from the future echoes through an antique radio connects the two living 20 years apart and changed Yong's life forever.

programme.title: My Puppy
programme.desc: A groom-to-be sets off with his friend to finding a new owner for his puppy.

programme.title: Innocent Witness
programme.desc: A housekeeper is charged with murder. Her attorney is surprised to learn the only witness to the crime is a teenage girl with Asperger's. Will the girl be able to provide a valid statement?

programme.title: Wonderful Nightmare
programme.desc: Due to a clerical error in heaven, a lawyer who doesnt believe in love dies in a car accident. To cover their mistake, she has to live as a housewife for a month before going back to her old life.

programme.title: In Our Prime

programme.title: Travel through Jiangsu Season 2 Ep15
programme.desc: Travel around the scenic spots and historic sites and the streets and alleys of the whole province of Jiangsu, look for historians, scholars, folk artisans, etc., explore a glimpse of what traditional Chinese culture and discover the unique charm of Jiangsu.

programme.title: Student Ep6
programme.desc: A tailor-made variety show for students. 12 students from different countries and subjects are invited in each episode to discuss various topics. Hosts include Ken Lin, Nadow Lin, and Amber An.

programme.title: The Shining One Season 2 Ep5
programme.desc: The experiences of interviewing, enrollment and elimination of nine interns in the financial industry were recorded to study for the status in a new workplace. programme.title: Across the Strait Ep63
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Governments policy of one country, two systems in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmens understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.desc: The play tells the story of people in the Chinese nuclear industry who work hard to realize the dream of becoming a powerful country with extraordinary ambition, strength and confidence.

programme.title: Xu Ni Wan Jia Deng Huo Ep15
programme.desc: The play tells the story of people in the Chinese nuclear industry who work hard to realize the dream of becoming a powerful country with extraordinary ambition, strength and confidence.

programme.title: On the Way Ep20
programme.desc: A large-scale tourism programme that is designed to present rich tourism resources in China and around the world

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: It concentrates on the latest news and social changes happening in china and all over the world

programme.title: China Showbiz Ep48
programme.desc: The China Showbiz gathers together a wide range of wonderful TV artistic works and directs viewers into a fabulous world of arts through works appreciation and review.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: It concentrates on the latest news and social changes happening in china and all over the world

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Report the Asia News on Asian view

programme.title: Nostalgia Ep41
programme.desc: Nostalgia aims to represent Chinese traditional culture by revealing life in villages in the way of story-telling. In this show, the audience can enjoy the natural and cultural backgrounds of Chinese traditional villages, and will find their knowledge of this oriental country expand through the interviews of Chinese people overseas whose memory and nostalgia can also reveal the very core value of the Chinese traditional culture.

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep66
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Governments policy of one country, two systems in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmens understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: It concentrates on the latest news and social changes happening in china and all over the world

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep486
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep910
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep40
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep912913
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep710
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3412
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep48124813
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep385386
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1892
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2157
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep986
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Hell Hole
programme.desc: The movie features three horror stories in different era: a pregnant woman haunted by a ghost sacrifices her life to save her baby; a boy commits suicide after being bullied by four medical students and his spirit returns for revenge; some company staff are haunted after they open a box of used clothes, releasing a more than 20-year resentment.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Ah Boys to Men
programme.desc: Ken is a rich and spoiled young man reluctant to be enlisted into National Service but must do so by law. He has to endure harsh training but it is made more bearable when he befriends three other recruits. When his girlfriend breaks up with him, Ken tries all ways to escape from camp so as to chase her back, but this leads to dire consequences

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Chois actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenixs (Cecilia Cheung) parents are martial arts superheroes, who hide their true identities while ferreting out evil martial artists. Phoenix gets the go-ahead to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny...

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Sex and the Beauties
programme.desc: It is said that Hong Kong is a sexy and sexual city where life is breathtakingly fast but glamorous. Fear of marriage, single & successful psychiatrist, Selina and other beauties seek for love and happy endings.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau II
programme.desc: Mark, the chief accountant of a money-laundering syndicate, has stolen US$15 billion from the fund and absconded to Thailand with his daughter. Interpol agent Lok seeks help from Ken, the God of Gamblers, to capture the syndicates mastermind. As they search for Mark to testify in the case, Ken reunites with the love of his life

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yu into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: Missbehavior
programme.desc: A group of friends who are formerly close but now somewhat estranged, unite to help one of their own who is in trouble at work. In this hilarious comedy, the friends must find a replacement bottle of breast milk before the end of the day as chaos breaks out!

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Night and Fog
programme.desc: Following The Way We Are, this is based on a true story happening in Tin Shui Wai. It revolves around an older, unemployed Hong Kong man, his young Mainland wife and their two daughters. Their lives, unfortunately, are anything but easy, and the shocking conclusion raises issues about the plight of the socially deprived lower class.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: A Friend From Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the masters granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: Carry On Doctors And Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: Descendant Of The Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: Big Times For The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again

programme.title: Heroes Shed No Tears
programme.desc: Kao Chien Fei is a young swordsman who wields a special sword with a teardrop marked on its blade. He is charged with averting an impending crisis in the martial arts world, but the villain, Zhou Tung Lai, wishes to become the ruler in the martial arts world, and launches a scheme to pit the various heroes against one another.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandits camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leaders wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: The Supreme Swordsman
programme.desc: After beating several famous swordsmen, Chin Wu Hsin of the Mo Shan clan challenges Supreme Swordsman to a duel, hoping to win his title, and is beaten and humiliated. The winner taunts him to find a Supreme Sword made by Old Eagle, a famous sword-maker. When his offer to buy a sword from Old Eagle, is turned down, he challenges Old Eagle to a duel, and snatches his sword in a foul play. Old Eagle's own son Shih Yen-peh vows to avenge for his father...

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: Man Of Iron
programme.desc: Chou Lian Huan (Chen Kuan Tai) is good at fist fighting in Shanghai. In order to please a hostess named Chen Ju Fang (Ching Li), he is willing to sacrifice everything and fight against the son of the gang leader in Shanghai. However, is Chous action worth it?

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: Lover'S Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a mans role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: The Proud Youth
programme.desc: Ling Hu Chong, a Huashan clans disciple, is assigned to find the successor to the score The Proud One. Ling identifies Ying for the score but finds out that she is the daughter of the evil clans leader. At the same time, he is unwittingly dragged into an epic power struggle between clans, with complicated allegiances and perplexing moralities.

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keepers daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: Lady Of Steel
programme.desc: A young swordswoman Fang Ying Qi sets out to join the Flying Dragon Clan in their defense against the invading Jin forces. Fang also intends to avenge the murder of her parents by bandit leader Han 20 years ago. Han has since taken on a false identity as a member of the Flying Dragon Clan and Fang must rely on her deadly sword skills to stop Han.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf to win the lantern contest, while Zhao plans for revenge. When Longs wife suddenly disappears one day and he hears about the story of human lanterns, Long suspects Zhao may be involved in the incident

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lins sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Duel Of Fist
programme.desc: Fan Ke discovers at his fathers deathbed that he has a half-brother, Wenlie, in Thailand. He goes to find Wenlie, who became a boxer to support his sick mother. Following their encounter, the two got involved in the underworld of boxing match gambling.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servants confusion, threatening the couples union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the Flying Guillotine Squad, a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: The Iron Buddha
programme.desc: After a notorious rapist Xiao kills his master and the entire clan, Han the last surviving disciple, decides to take revenge. He must find the legendary Hulong Blade to counter Xiao's Evil Poisonous Sword, but as Han has never seen Xiao before, he is deceived when Xiao poses as an ally to try and steal his Blade in the process.

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chans family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chans daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ruffians
programme.desc: A gang of unemployed martial artists seem to have their bad fortunes turned when the head of a local security agency hires them to take out the competition, who their new employer insists is up to no good. However, the men are being played for fools and have to take each other on until the last drop of blood is spilled.

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: The Tea House
programme.desc: Real-life champion martial artist Chen Kuan-Tai plays a powerful role in this memorable saga of action and romance; fighting against gangsters for his true love.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: Transformed from a young laboratory researcher, the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan must battle Princess Dragon Mom who wakes up from hibernation to conquer the earth with her army of mutant monsters.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: The Lady Hermit hides away for years to plot revenge after being defeated by the evil Black Knight. Young swordswoman Tsui Ping is determined to take down Black Knight herself and begs Lady Hermit to teach her martial arts skills. The Black Knight's days are numbered when the Lady Hermit and her protege perfect the technique to take him down.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, shes soon framed for her husbands murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, a young man, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and manages to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gang again while in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.desc: Tamil comedy-drama film, Starring, Sri Divya, Bobby Simha, Parvathy Thiruvothu, Rana Daggubati & Others

programme.desc: Tamil Action Film, Starring, Mammootty, Sunny Leone, Jai, Mahima Nambiar, Anusree, Nedumudi Venu & Others

programme.title: Tad, The Lost Explorer And The Emerald Tablet
programme.desc: Tads dream to be accepted by his archaeology colleagues gets cut short when he mistakenly breaks a cursed sarcophagus. After awakening the spirit inside, it's up to Tad and Sara to lead a heroic journey and stop the curse of the Emerald Tablet.

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: Based on the world phenomenal video game, Warcraft is an epic adventure of the world-colliding conflict between the human civilisation and the orc warriors.

programme.title: Firestarter
programme.desc: Firestarter' follows a young girl (Ryan Kiera Armstrong) who develops pyrokinesis, attracting the attention of a secret government agency bent on exploiting her power as a weapon.

programme.title: 17 Again
programme.desc: 30-something Mike ODonnell is given a second shot at life when he is miraculously transformed back to the age of 17.

programme.title: Crashbox S1 Ep16
programme.desc: An outrageously insane new game show of puzzles and brainteasers for kids to play on television.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Speechless On The Seine - While in Paris, France, Ben catches Zombozo robbing the Louvre, but when Zombozo hypnotizes Ben to remain speechless, Ben must navigate a foreign land like a mime in order to stop the criminal clown and his travelling circus.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Poles Apart - A trip to the South Pole goes upside down when Team Tennyson lands on the North Pole instead, but Ben quickly discovers the culprits: Solar & Polar Twain, magnetically-powered scientists who want to hold the world ransom by threatening to reverse Earth's magnetic poles!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Show Don't Tell - Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max arrive at a Native American national park to witness the Ayasha Plinths - an ancient Stonehenge-like rock formation - but when the sinister sorcerer Hex arrives, Ben must battle against a beast Hex magically made out of huge rocks!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Don't Touch - Team Tennyson checks out a Samurai Museum in Tokyo, where Ben is too impatient to wait out the Calligraphy experience for the more exciting-sounding Samurai one, but when a dangerous Samurai sword is stolen from the exhibit, Ben must take on its thief - the new Big Bad in town, the Forever Knight.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Big In Japan - During a tour of the Japanese Robotics Museum, Ben finds hero-gone-wrong Tim Buktu 'trying to save' Tokyo from a Dragon, but has Tim finally turned over a new leaf, or is this just another one of his half-baked plans to play the part of hero?

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Revenge Of The Swamp Monster! - Scooby-Doo and the Mystery Inc. gang meet up with basketball legend and bowling aficionado Chris Paul at a golf tournament fundraiser held in Florida.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Peebles' Pet Shop Of Terrible Terrors! - Scooby and the gang meet Wanda Sykes.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Scooby Of A Thousand Faces! - When a marble statue comes to life at a museum in Greece our gang is caught between a braying minotaur and a sword-wielding Wonder Woman!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Mixed-Up Mixer - The Lion is named King of the Forest now he has his medal of courage. Will his trek over water, darkness and spiders be too much for this scaredy cat? Or will he learn the real meaning of courage?

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Ojo The Unlucky - While making cookies Dorothy accidentally pours the Potion of Life into the mixing bowl, causing disaster! Dorothy must use the mirror to change the Potion of Life into the Liquid of Petrification.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Lion's Share - A love magnet is a great Valentine's Day gift but it magically makes everyone fall in love with Dorothy, overwhelming her. Could there be such a thing as too much love?

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Rules Of Attraction - Dorothy and the gang take Ojo the Unlucky to the Land of Ev to reverse his curse. But too late they realise the origins of his name and they are plagued with the worst bad luck they've ever seen!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Brain Power Of Love - Dorothy and Ozma have lost their voices after playfully calling out 'jinx!' Now they must travel to the land of Jibber Jab and meet the Yakity Yaks for the antidote.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Jinxed - The Scarecrow just stammers and stumbles around the scrappy dressmaker, Patchwork Girl. So Wilhelmina thinks Patchwork Girl must be a witch and traps her to find the secret of stealing brainpower.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 Ep1
programme.desc: I Wish He Were Still Here - When Daniel and Ruby OReilly move to the orchard home theyve inherited from Daniels eccentric uncle, the place seems inhospitable - until Ruby makes a discovery that changes everything: a magic well that feeds her cryptic visions of unfulfilled wishes.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes Of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Grindelwald escapes custody and Albus Dumbledore enlists his former student Newt Scamander, who agrees to help, unaware of the dangers that lie ahead.

programme.desc: Ben 10 joins forces with his future self.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Welcome To Zombozo-Zone! - During medieval times, Team Tennyson must fight to remember that they're not in the past at all, but actually at a Renaissance-esque faire- where 'King Zombozo' has hypnotized its guests into thinking they live in the past!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Bridge Out - After an overpass collapses on the highway, Team Tennyson is in a traffic jam along with Simon Sez and family, but when Ben and Simon team up to tackle the gridlock together, Simon only makes matters much, much worse.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Cyber Slammers - At Biggie Box Japan, Ben waits in an epic line for the release of the latest Sumo Slammers video game, Cyber Slammers, but Ben must soon save the store- not from game-hungry customers, but from Steam Smythe, who wants to retro-fit a massive mech with steam punk powers!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Big Ben 10 - When Ben and family go to London to visit the legendary Big Ben, the Bugg Brothers are there to greet them - with yet another outrageously over-the-top plan of course: to shrink the Big Ben bell in order to steal it!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Beach Heads - After traveling to Tampa Beach, Florida, Team Tennyson hope to get some much-needed rest & relaxation, but the tempests without a temper, the Weatherheads, have other plans that Ben must thwart: to build a new beach base!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Ollie Ollie In-Come Free! - Our mystery solving gang agrees to help Ricky Gervais with a haunted antique Egyptian statue of a cat.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep8
programme.desc: The Cursed Cabinet Of Professor Madds Markson! - The gang spends one night in the haunted Savannah Hotel.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Attack Of The Weird Al-Osaurus! - The gang discover a camp run by Weird Al Yankovic!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Rise Of The Nome King - The Nome King tricks Dorothy into using the Magic Magnifying Glass on him, and once he's big enough, he makes himself a giant who can take over Oz. So Dorothy will have to make everything else big!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep13
programme.desc: One-Winged Wally - Dorothy and her friends find a one-winged monkey, who has run away from home. Dorothy feels sorry for the monkey and is determined to get him his second wing so she asks for Ozma's help.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Wand-Erful - The Good Witch loses her wand and Dorothy takes a break from teaching Toto to 'fetch', to find it. Wilhelmina gets the wand first, but can Toto remember to 'fetch' or will his mistake come in handy?

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep15
programme.desc: No Sleep Sleepover - Wilhelmina is mad she's been left out of a slumber party and tries to ruin it by creating a giant Pillow Monster. But the Pillow Monster attacks the party, and rampages toward Wilhelmina's castle!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Lion Catches A Bug - Lion has caught a 'bug,' so Ozma shrinks Dorothy, Tin Man and Scarecrow so they can enter his ear and remove the bug. With the bug gone, Dorothy inspires Lion to protect the Emerald Forest!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Tik Tok And Tin Man - Tin Man worries that Tik Tok will replace him as the mechanical man of the group. Tin Man decides that he should leave, but Dorothy, Scarecrow and Lion must convince him that he can't be replaced.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 Ep2
programme.desc: I Wish I Knew Where To Start - A wish involving a librarian, a treasure map, and a new perspective all help Ruby discover that her love of helping others comes from her mom, who passed away a year ago. While Ruby faces the difficulty of talking about her past, Daniel struggles to overcome small-town gossip and his familys bad reputation.

programme.title: Monster Beach
programme.desc: Siblings Jan and Dean are packed off to stay with their easygoing uncle in a place that should be complete paradise, but why is so deserted? What are those strange noises coming from the beach?

programme.desc: A young boy discovers the secret headquarters of the worlds most powerful superhero hidden beneath his home and must defend it with his group of friends when villains attack.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 1
programme.desc: Eureka! We've found another 20 examples of modern innovations you just can't live without. We've got a belt for your booty, a robot that pours beer and an exciting new way to enjoy butter. programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 2
programme.desc: Gentlemen, start your engines! We've got a motorcade of 20 of the dumbest drivers to ever turn an ignition. There's a backwards biker, a superhero stopped for speeding and an extreme case of Russian road rage. Along for the ride is our celebrity castincluding Judy Gold, Danny Bonaduce, Kevin McCaffrey and Billy Kimball.

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Discover how 15 billion tablets of a historic candy are made; what the real secret ingredent is in the best Pilsener beer; how a modern update of Ancient Egyptian technology allows for the delectable union of blueberries and chocolate.

programme.title: Patrick Aryee's Wild World S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jaguar - Biologist Patrick Aryee is in Costa Rica to witness the annual mass nesting of sea turtles, as well as the predatory jaguars that come in for the kill.

programme.title: Stanley Tucci: Searching for Italy S2 Ep4
programme.desc: London - Stanley Tucci sets out to explore how Italian immigration has transformed the food scene in his adopted hometown of London.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Jungle Nightmare - A violent attack happened to a tribesman in the Bolivian jungle. Cyril's on a mission to find out what kind of monster fish could be the culprit of such a violent attack.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Canada - It's deep into the Canadian wilderness for this week's challenge: searching for the White Sturgeon, the biggest freshwater fish in North America.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - To the Rescue Ep6
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including ranch manager Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - A Capuchin’s Tale Ep1
programme.desc: Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Weatherproof Ep1
programme.desc: Steer clear of these alphas, whose horns, claws, and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out. Examine killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Agile Ep2
programme.desc: Check out some fancy footwork and killer alpha moves. Catch a male brown hare throwing punches at his beloved, admire a sandhill crane dance battle, watch ibexes butt heads (literally) during mating season, and see why leopards are stealth masters.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Social Ep3
programme.desc: Meet alphas who get by with a little help from their friends. Discover the inescapable gang mentality of mating male dolphins, ponder ant colonies unique scents, find out why female geladas always get the last word, and see wolves hunt family-style.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Scrappy Ep4
programme.desc: Celebrate small but mighty animal warriors armed with sheaves of scary weapons. Admire nutrias stink bombs; honey badgers savage, needle-like choppers; black-tailed gulls razor-sharp beaks; and the killer talons on dive-bombing peregrine falcons.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Endangered Species Ep3
programme.desc: With seven of Ontarios eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow and not entirely smart, which means they keep taking a beating - from predators, and from cars.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 - Cambodia: Hidden Refuges Ep7
programme.desc: Cambodia is a country that lies almost entirely within the Mekong basin, flanked by Thailand, Laos and Vietnam. The Mekong travels the length of the country entering in the north and tracking south, cutting the region into two halves. Every habitat here is somehow linked to the Mekongs waters. Whether it be its tributaries which connect and traverse much of the countries terrain, or the seasonal flooding that influences landscapes miles beyond its reach.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - A Pangolin's Plight Ep5
programme.desc: Feel heartbreak when Dr. Amandas team loses a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, but cheer when another is released post-rehab. Check on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the centers baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

Whether it be its tributaries which connect and traverse much of the countries terrain, or the seasonal flooding that influences landscapes miles beyond its reach.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Back from the Dead Ep8
programme.desc: Sometimes animals get a second chance. Like the majestic elk, which went extinct in Ontario thanks to habitat loss and over-aggressive hunting. But a few years ago, hundreds of elk were brought back, to re-populate the province in four different areas. Some floundered because of new, aggressive local predators. But a colony of elk in Burwash, on a former prison ground, is thriving.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Joined at the Hip Ep4
programme.desc: The animal kingdom can be a harsh place, but some baby animals have a family ready to take care of their needs. Meet some of these adorable babies and their clans: a koala joey, European elk twins, a litter of Asian short-clawed otters, and black howler monkey youngsters.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Africa Titans Ep1
programme.desc: The death of a wild black rhino after a fight with another dominant male, and a 14-year-old blind black rhino becomes the new ambassador for the species.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 - Cambodia: Seasonal Cycles Ep8
programme.desc: This episode follows the seasonal eb and flow of the Mekong through Cambodia - a nation where everything has a special relationship with water. From Cambodias diverse wildlife to people living in the stilt villages of lake Tonle Sap, the Mekong has dictated the lives of everything that lives there for centuries.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Crocodile Capers Ep6
programme.desc: Strap in for Dr. Amandas risky attempt to collar a wild roan antelope. Later, chase down blue monkey Indigo while unrest ensues among the vervets. Examine an eagle owl with bumblefoot and say adieu to Sheila the croc, whos headed back to the wild.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Sammi, Rose, and Casey Ep1
programme.desc: Roam across America with a road-tripping chicken and meet a mouse family living in an English garden. Beat arachnophobia with a spiders help, trek with the guardian of Earths last two northern white rhinos, and celebrate more interspecies pals.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - The Hummingbird’s Quest Ep2
programme.desc: From Colombias high plains of the Pramo to its tropical forests, hummingbirds have evolved into an extraordinary number of species. Whether battling freezing rain or jungle predators, each mother must struggle to build a nest, protect her eggs.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Weatherproof Ep1

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Boreal Ep5
programme.desc: Travel to the Arctic for a peek at the brutal challenges of life in the boreal forest, then admire some stellar animal adaptations. Witness a secret reindeer superpower, navigate a rodent labyrinth of snow, and learn why moose are gourmets at heart.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Extreme Ep6
programme.desc: Learn how plants and animals tough it out in some of the driest terrain Earth has to offer. Run across thirsty trees that act as elephant signposts, see insects team up with plants for a chance at life, and get insight into natural chemical warfare.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Joined at the Hip Ep4
programme.desc: The animal kingdom can be a harsh place, but some baby animals have a family ready to take care of their needs. Meet some of these adorable babies and their clans: a koala joey, European elk twins, a litter of Asian short-clawed otters, and black howler monkey youngsters.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 - Cambodia: Seasonal Cycles Ep8
programme.desc: This episode follows the seasonal eb and flow of the Mekong through Cambodia - a nation where everything has a special relationship with water. From Cambodias diverse wildlife to people living in the stilt villages of lake Tonle Sap, the Mekong has dictated the lives of everything that lives there for centuries.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Crocodile Capers Ep6
programme.desc: Strap in for Dr. Amandas risky attempt to collar a wild roan antelope. Later, chase down blue monkey Indigo while unrest ensues among the vervets. Examine an eagle owl with bumblefoot and say adieu to Sheila the croc, whos headed back to the wild.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Weatherproof Ep1
programme.desc: Steer clear of these alphas, whose horns, claws, and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out. Examine killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Agile Ep2
programme.desc: Check out some fancy footwork and killer alpha moves. Catch a male brown hare throwing punches at his beloved, admire a sandhill crane dance battle, watch ibexes butt heads (literally) during mating season, and see why leopards are stealth masters.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Social Ep3
programme.desc: Meet alphas who get by with a little help from their friends. Discover the inescapable gang mentality of mating male dolphins, ponder ant colonies unique scents, find out why female geladas always get the last word, and see wolves hunt family-style.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Scrappy Ep4
programme.desc: Celebrate small but mighty animal warriors armed with sheaves of scary weapons. Admire nutrias stink bombs; honey badgers savage, needle-like choppers; black-tailed gulls razor-sharp beaks; and the killer talons on dive-bombing peregrine falcons.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Sammi, Rose, and Casey Ep1
programme.desc: Roam across America with a road-tripping chicken and meet a mouse family living in an English garden. Beat arachnophobia with a spiders help, trek with the guardian of Earths last two northern white rhinos, and celebrate more interspecies pals.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - The Hummingbird’s Quest Ep2
programme.desc: From Colombias high plains of the Pramo to its tropical forests, hummingbirds have evolved into an extraordinary number of species. Whether battling freezing rain or jungle predators, each mother must struggle to build a nest, protect her eggs.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Refugees of Laikipia Ep2
programme.desc: The mass relocation of an endangered species of Hartebeest from a game reserve to Ol Pejeta, so the land can be resettled by refugees.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 - Vietnam: Life in the Delta Ep9
programme.desc: The final country on the Mekongs journey is the home of the rivers mighty delta. A large deposit of rich nutrients carried downstream from hundreds of kilometres makes this region, the jewel of Vietnams crown, a biological treasure trove.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Waterhole Ep1
programme.desc: Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badgers risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Bandit, Max, and George Ep2
programme.desc: Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - Warriors of the Llanos Ep3
programme.desc: The flat savannas of the Colombian Llanos are governed by seasonal extremes that push life to the brink. In this unforgiving arena, there are no second chances, and only creatures best adapted to their brutal extremes will make it through a year.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Boreal Ep5
programme.desc: Travel to the Arctic for a peek at the brutal challenges of life in the boreal forest, then admire some stellar animal adaptations. Witness a secret reindeer superpower, navigate a rodent labyrinth of snow, and learn why moose are gourmets at heart.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Bandit, Max, and George Ep2

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - Warriors of the Llanos Ep3
programme.desc: The flat savannas of the Colombian Llanos are governed by seasonal extremes that push life to the brink. In this unforgiving arena, there are no second chances, and only creatures best adapted to their brutal extremes will make it through a year.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - A Tale of Two Penguins Ep1
programme.desc: At the waters edge a brave group of male penguins gather, preparing to make the dangerous journey ashore. With many threats ahead, there is safety in number and these petite penguins have important business to attend. Its time to breed and they must find a burrow before the females arrive.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Untamed West Ep2
programme.desc: New Zealands West Coast is like nowhere else on Earth. From glacier-covered mountains to rain-drenched native forests to rough frigid seas, the landscape defies belief. Isolated from the rest of the world, this strip of almost untouched wilderness hides a host of endemic animals. Evolutionary castaways, every one of them is a rare ecological jewel. From alpine parrots and shy penguins to mammal-like kiwis and ancient eels. To survive the conditions the wildlife here has to be hardy, cunning and resourceful. A journey along the West Coast reveals the beauty of this land, and the trials and tribulations of the wildlife that live here.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep40
programme.desc: The Case Of The Stolen Treasure - The pirates are having a spring clean of their galleon, much to the annoyance of Pirate Stripes who wants to go on a treasure hunt. Later that day, the pirate treasure disappears! Oh no! Noddy needs to investigate at once. A strange new galleon appears on the horizon. Could it be Tina the Terrible? Has she stolen the treasure? Using all his detecting skills Noddy follows the clues to the DareDale Caves where he realises that the ship on the horizon isn't Tina the Terrible's galleon at all. It's the shadow of a toy ship! He works out that Pirate Stripes took the treasure so that they could go on a treasure hunt to look for it! Pirate Stripes apologises for taking the treasure and returns it. Pirate Captain tells her that they've had such fun hunting for the treasure that they should do it again! Well done, Noddy. You've saved the day!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep40
programme.desc: Why Whale Spouts - You see there was a time when Whale didn't spout. Then one day there is a big storm in Tinga Tinga. The winds blew stronger and the ocean waves got bigger and bigger. Suddenly an enormous wave picks up Whale and carries her all the way from the ocean to the Waterhole. SPLOSH! But Whale was so full of water that she couldn't move! How do the animals help Whale get back to the ocean? For once, Elephant has the answer. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep40
programme.desc: Pit Stop Perils - Mr Carburettor is fed up with Roary and Maxi constantly bickering about who is the fastest car at Silver Hatch. He decrees that the pair will have a race, and whoever wins, is the fastest - no more arguing!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep14
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The King's Armour - It's Knights and Dragons Day at school and Pat has to travel to a Welsh castle to pick up some ancient artefacts and Sarah Gilbertson's Auntie Jackie! Pat is rather partial to a suit of armour - and when he's presented with a real one at the castle, he can't resist trying it on! But the suit gets stuck shut, leaving the excitable children wondering where their artefacts are! As they wait, Sarah Gilbertson starts telling them tales of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys and her ancestor King Gilbertson' and his knightly adventures, which Bill is loathe to believe. Unable to free himself from the suit of armour, Pat has no choice but to fly back Greendale wearing it! At the school, the children are enraptured when the plane lands and a real knight steps out! It must be King Gilbertson'! To Sarah G's delight, Auntie Jackie emerges from the plane - and Bill becomes a hero when he discovers to real purpose of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys - it opens the suit of armour!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep12
programme.desc: Furious Fun - The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep12
programme.desc: Ottos - When a meteor crashes into the Wrenchtools' home, the Dinotrux take them to safe ground; little do they know D-Structs is planning a giant attack.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep12
programme.desc: Curse Of The Cicadas / Beat A Fajita - The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep12
programme.desc: Sitting On Babies / Best Frenemies - Things go very wrong when Tip and Oh watch the Gorg babies at a cheese-themed playland/Captain Smek pretends to be Oh's friend just to ruin his day.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep9
programme.desc: Lucky And The Super Amazing And Fun Cousin Julian - Luckys buttons are pushed when her seemingly perfect cousin Julian comes to visit but reveals himself to be a junior con man

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep10
programme.desc: Lucky And The Harvest Hunt - Lucky takes part in a secret Miradero tradition a nighttime scavenger hunt

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep26
programme.desc: Dawn Of The Broods Part 1 & Part 2 - Grug convinces The Croods to go on vacation, and they find a new family, The Broods, who live in a solitary utopia too good to be true/The Croods must escape and warn Ahhh! Valley before it's too late.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep27
programme.desc: It Takes Ahhh Valley Part 1 & 2 - When the Croods return to Ahhh! Valley they find that the evil Brood family has taken over and Grug must work with fellow Valleyites to defeat them

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep27
programme.desc: Bossa Nova - After Boss Baby is fired from Baby Corp;he attempts to navigate regular baby life in a Mommy/Daddy/Baby playgroup. Even worse;the playgroups other new member is Mega Fat;whose animatronic stuffie Wagby malfunctions and threatens the safety of the whole group. Meanwhile;Tim does everything he can to avoid doing his homework.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep29
programme.desc: Ga Ba Goo Ba Ga (The Babblist) - Theres a new babblist in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away;and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile;Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Babys help.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep28
programme.desc: The Museum Job - When the crowded bathroom situation at the local museum threatens baby love;Boss Baby leads his new team of playgroup babies on their first missionand then their SECOND mission after a klepto baby in their group swipes a priceless artifact. In a continued attempt to avoid homework;Tim joins Boss Baby on his mission.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep1
programme.desc: A Cause for The Paws - Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep2
programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep29
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep12
programme.desc: The Next Big Sting - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders rescue a wounded Speed Stinger and take it back to Dragon's Edge, unaware of the dangers that follow.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep38
programme.desc: The Partier's Apprentice / Hair Ball - Guy is running himself ragged trying to be the life of the party for every party in Troll Village. When Poppy suggests he train an apprentice, it seems like the solution to his problems! Until his apprentice starts to surpass his partying skills/When Smidge accidentally agrees to go with both Milton and Guy to the Trolls fanciest event, the Hair Ball, she must navigate the difficulties of her situation with help from her friends.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep12
programme.desc: Diapers Are The New Black - King Julien discovers diapers and brings style to his lemur subjects, igniting a fashion war.
